summary: This is an email from an individual (likely a victim advocate or case worker) to an unnamed recipient regarding a request for therapy funding (EVAF) and referrals for a trauma-focused therapist for an Epstein victim. The email is brief and focuses on coordinating support services.

persons.name: IMM IMM
persons.context: Appears to be the sender of an email coordinating therapy referrals and funding for an Epstein victim.

events.title: Therapy referral request for Epstein victim
events.description: An email is sent requesting trauma-focused therapist referrals and EVAF (likely Epstein Victims' Assistance Fund) funding for an Epstein victim.

keyFacts: An email dated June 17, 2020, discusses securing therapy and funding for an Epstein victim.
The email references 'EVAF,' which likely stands for Epstein Victims' Assistance Fund, indicating ongoing victim support efforts years after Epstein's death.
The correspondence highlights the continued need for trauma-focused therapeutic services for individuals affected by the Epstein case.
